content: The researchers are quick to point out that genes are not necessarily destiny and that devoted parents can still influence their children in positive ways, even if they are only working on a small percentage of the total variation.
translations: ita:I ricercatori sono rapidi a sottolineare che i geni non sono necessariamente il destino e che i genitori devoti possono
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by DJ_Saidez (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
